name: Michael Rodriguez
summary_blurb: Michael Rodriguez is an experienced analyst with a strong focus on the Technology and Consumer sectors. He has a proven track record in fundamental analysis and investment processes, contributing to significant portfolio management efforts. His background includes roles at notable firms such as Fidelity Asset Management and William Blair.
notable_experience: William Blair, Fixed Income Sales & Trading
education_highlight: B.S. in Finance from University of Michigan, Ross School of Business
